narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Edwin Suarez is a Physical Therapist provider based in Las Vegas, NV. From 2018-01 through 2018-12, this provider received $156K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 526 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.7× the national median for 97110 (97110), at $65 per claim vs. the median of $24, placing them above the 90th percentile.
100% of billing is concentrated in 97110 (97110), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2018-12, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
